Details:
Indicates whether FreeIPA or OpenLDAP is setup.
                                                          
     Choices:                                             
                                                          
     * ``openldap`` <- Default                               
     * ``freeipa``

* Sets the intended domain name.        
* If dc=omnia,dc=test, Provide ``omnia.test``
* If dc=dell,dc=omnia,dc=com Provide ``dell.omnia.com``  
                                   
    **Default values**: ``omnia.test``

* Boolean indicating whether security features are to be enabled on the login node or not. 

    **Default value**: ``false``
